caption.p: Schematic drawing of Spike-RBD/TMPRSS2/ACE2 axis. The left half illustrates the native counter-interaction between the RAS pathway and ACE2. The right half highlights four targets of phytomedicine against the Spike-RBD/TMPRSS2/ACE2 axis following SARS-CoV-2 infection. The inset shows the furin cleavage site (-RRAR-) of a spike glycoprotein.
